item.title: Scratching My Own Itch
item.description: I love to learn. One of my favorite past time is challenging my preconceived notions. Being wrong for the right reasons puts me out of my comfort zone. Through it, I feel I am improving my life. Yet, learning seems to be a frustrating and futile experience. Why frustrating and futile you ask? Because I tend to forget most of what I learned. After many rounds of this forgetting cycle, I have a sense that it is all for naught.
